attributes.action: Increse the Road tax or Introduce the Road Levie Sooner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK should be a leading light in the way we deal with the issues surrounding the environment. Over half of journeys made in the UK are completely unnecessary and as such they should be taxed off the road and made to walk and use public transport. We are not harsh enough, we need to act now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
